snippet: The late artist, who created compelling, thought-provoking abstractions from existing imagery, has a new show opening at Petzel Gallery to complement his in-progress exhibition at MoMA.
abstract: The late artist, who created compelling, thought-provoking abstractions from existing imagery, has a new show opening at Petzel Gallery to complement his in-progress exhibition at MoMA.

headline.main: Robert Heinecken, Master of the Photographic Juxtaposition
